title: Metrication: the task for management
creator_credit: Tony Matthews, British Broadcasting Corporation and Charles Pascoe
brief_description: Indicates to management how to plan and co-ordinate the changeover to metric working in order to minimise cost and maximise benefits. The first film considers the context of metrication, and identifies the tasks required to carry out the change.
